name: Node.js on a Single VM on VMware
description: Node.js - An execution environment for event-driven server-side applications.

metadata.longDescription: Deploys a single node of Node.js in VMware for development use, where Node.js is an execution environment for event-driven server-side and networking applications.

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description: 1. Node.js: an execution environment for event-driven server-side and networking applications

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • Cores - 1
      • Memory - 1GB
      • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Allows HTTP to all destinations
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • Ingress - Allows SSH from all sources
      • Egress - All

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  2. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  3. More details of software can be found in https://nodejs.org/en/.
